content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":253672,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦いたくはないが、戦わざるえない","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't want to fight, but I have no choice but to."},{"lineNumber":253673,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tもがき苦しんでクレイジードラゴンが倒れる","translatedEnglishLine":"The Crazy Dragon struggles and collapses."},{"lineNumber":253674,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t見てられないとハンティ辺りが言ってもいいかも","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe someone like Huntie might say they can't bear to watch."},{"lineNumber":253675,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその側で動けなくなっている　宝箱だんご　を捕まえる","translatedEnglishLine":"They catch the treasure chest dumpling that has become unable to move nearby."},{"lineNumber":253676,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t宝箱だんごはもう逃げない、荷物持ちにされた。→　なんか理由つけて","translatedEnglishLine":"The treasure chest dumpling won't run away anymore; it was made a pack bearer. → Add some reason for this."},{"lineNumber":253677,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこいつが持っているのが聖櫃か、うわっ・・重た","translatedEnglishLine":"Is that what's being carried the holy ark? Wow... it's heavy."},{"lineNumber":253678,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t中は・・おわっ、死体、死体、ミイラ、・・ポピンズのミイラー","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside...Whoa, corpses, corpses, mummies... Poppins' mummified form."},{"lineNumber":253679,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこれが闘神の本体であるという説明","translatedEnglishLine":"An explanation that this is the true form of the Battle God."},{"lineNumber":253680,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t闘神シグマの部屋にも戻ったし再稼働させるかというところで","translatedEnglishLine":"After returning to the Battle God Sigma's room, just as they were about to reactivate it,"},{"lineNumber":253681,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tずどどーんと部屋の壁に何かが激突","translatedEnglishLine":"With a thundering crash, something smashes into the wall of the room."},{"lineNumber":253682,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tげっクレイジードラゴンがまた襲ってきたなんてしぶとい","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, the Crazy Dragon attacked again—what a tenacious one."},{"lineNumber":253683,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今なら間に合う逃げるかとなるかランスだけは別の手を考えた","translatedEnglishLine":"While everyone thought to escape since there's still time, only Rance considered another way."},{"lineNumber":253684,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t闘神シグマを目覚めさせて戦わせるのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Wake up the Battle God Sigma and have it fight."},{"lineNumber":253685,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそんな・・目覚めるかどうか賭けだぞ・・（さっきのパットンの話ちょっと触れて）","translatedEnglishLine":"But... it's a gamble whether it will awaken... (briefly refer to the earlier Patton story)."},{"lineNumber":253686,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tとにかくやれーと、シーラが再可動させる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Just do it! Sheila activates it again."},{"lineNumber":253687,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tどきどき・・どきどき・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Heartbeat... heartbeat..."},{"lineNumber":253688,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tどかーんクレイジードラゴンが壁を破って現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Boom! The Crazy Dragon breaks through the wall and appears."},{"lineNumber":253689,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tもう駄目かというところで、どどどどーと音がして、闘神シグマが目覚める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Just when all seemed lost, with a rumbling sound, Battle God Sigma awakens."},{"lineNumber":253690,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tわードラゴンがくるー、お願いシグマ助けてーと叫ぶと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, the dragon is coming—please Sigma, save us!\" someone cries out."},{"lineNumber":253691,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシグマとクレイジードラゴンがぶつかりあう","translatedEnglishLine":"Sigma and the Crazy Dragon clash."},{"lineNumber":253692,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tちょっと怪獣ものっぽいノリでもいいかも","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe having a bit of a monster-movie vibe could work."},{"lineNumber":253693,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t倒す前、仲間の変わり果てた姿に同情的なことを言いトドメ","translatedEnglishLine":"Before finishing it off, say something sympathetic about the altered state of the companion, then deliver the final blow."},{"lineNumber":253694,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tクレイジードラゴンはやっと死ねたという感じで倒れる","translatedEnglishLine":"The Crazy Dragon falls as if finally able to die."},{"lineNumber":253695,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t死ぬ前に正気に戻ったのがいいかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"It might be good if it regained sanity before dying."},{"lineNumber":253696,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tここで始めて話をする　意外と気さくな奴とわかるとか","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the first time it talks, revealing it's surprisingly easygoing."},{"lineNumber":253697,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle"},{"lineNumber":253698,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t闘神ゼータ、闘神シグマの語らい、久しぶりじゃのとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle God Zeta and Battle God Sigma converse, saying things like \"It's been a while.\""},{"lineNumber":253699,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tビスケッタさんなども入れて和気あいあい","translatedEnglishLine":"Including Biscetta and others, a friendly and lively atmosphere."},{"lineNumber":253700,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシグマの性格は任せますが、ここで魅力的な感じに見せて下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll leave Sigma's personality up to you, but please make him appear charming here."},{"lineNumber":253701,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t闘神ゼータ、お前の本体のミイラなのか。","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle God Zeta, is that mummy your true form?"},{"lineNumber":253702,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの城の地下に聖櫃を置かせてもらっているぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"We're letting you keep the holy ark in the basement of this castle."},{"lineNumber":253703,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t俺の城に気持ち悪い物をおくなよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't put creepy stuff in my castle."},{"lineNumber":253704,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tところで、闘神シグマ、お前もここから動けないのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, Battle God Sigma, can’t you move from here either?"},{"lineNumber":253705,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t自分の闘神都市は壊れてないからな、動く為の要塞が無い","translatedEnglishLine":"My Battle God city isn't broken, but I lack a fortress to move around."},{"lineNumber":253706,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tだが、自分の聖櫃は特別製で小さい、元がポピンズという事もあるが","translatedEnglishLine":"But my holy ark is a specially made, small one—originally it was Poppins, after all."},{"lineNumber":253707,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t試作として携帯可能な物として作ったのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"It was made as a prototype for something portable."},{"lineNumber":253708,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそこの宝箱だんご君が一緒に聖櫃を持ち運んでくれたらどこに移動出来るが","translatedEnglishLine":"If that treasure chest dumpling over there carries the holy ark together, I could move anywhere."},{"lineNumber":253709,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t残念、携帯用マナバッテリーがまだ開発出来ていない。短時間ならともかく","translatedEnglishLine":"Unfortunately, a portable mana battery hasn't been developed yet. Short durations might be okay, but..."},{"lineNumber":253710,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t作戦行動をするにはとちエネルギー不足だな","translatedEnglishLine":"There's too little energy for operational activities."},{"lineNumber":253711,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t根こそぎ魔力を注いでくれる魔法使いがいれば・・とシィルを見つめる","translatedEnglishLine":"If there was a magician who could pour all their mana into me... he looks at Sieel."},{"lineNumber":253712,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシィル＝過去にユプシロンの燃料にされた事を思いだし、怖がる","translatedEnglishLine":"Sieel recalls being used as fuel for Epsilon in the past and becomes afraid."},{"lineNumber":253713,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tじょうだんじゃ、普通の娘には無理だ、下手したら魔力吸い出しすぎて殺してしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"No joke, an ordinary girl can't do it; if done badly, too much mana will be drained and she'll be killed."},{"lineNumber":253714,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tここでアニス登場、あっ・・こいつなら。","translatedEnglishLine":"At this point, Anis appears — Oh... if it's her."},{"lineNumber":253715,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle"},{"lineNumber":253716,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスがホーネット抱きたい","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance wants to hold Hornet."},{"lineNumber":253717,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tだから救出する","translatedEnglishLine":"So he'll rescue her."},{"lineNumber":253718,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t図書室","translatedEnglishLine":"Library"},{"lineNumber":253719,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\tハウゼルから情報を聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Hear information from Howser."},{"lineNumber":253720,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t客室","translatedEnglishLine":"Guest room"},{"lineNumber":253721,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\tシルキィから情報を聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Hear information from Silky."},{"lineNumber":253722,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t司令部で作戦会議","translatedEnglishLine":"Strategy meeting at headquarters."},{"lineNumber":253723,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔物隊長ラカンが現れ","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon commander Lakan appears."},{"lineNumber":253724,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t自らが囮になる作戦","translatedEnglishLine":"A plan where he becomes the decoy himself."},{"lineNumber":253725,"originalJapaneseLine":"中止を選択した直後","translatedEnglishLine":"Immediately after choosing to cancel."},{"lineNumber":253726,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはやらないと言い切るランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance declares firmly that will not be done."},{"lineNumber":253727,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラカンは食い下がり、なら我々だけで行うとか言うが","translatedEnglishLine":"Lakan pushes back, saying then we'll go alone."},{"lineNumber":253728,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラと（シルキィorハウゼル)が止める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera and (Silky or Howser) stop him."},{"lineNumber":253729,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう少し確実な作戦を考えるのだ、時を待て","translatedEnglishLine":"We should think of a more certain plan; wait for the right time."},{"lineNumber":253730,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前達は、俺の配下につけ。いいな","translatedEnglishLine":"You all will serve under me. Understand?"},{"lineNumber":253731,"originalJapaneseLine":"こうしてラカン率いるホーネット派残党５万の魔物兵は","translatedEnglishLine":"Thus, the 50,000 demon soldiers loyal to the Hornet faction led by Lakan..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いたくはないが、戦わざるえない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't want to fight, but I have no choice but to.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もがき苦しんでクレイジードラゴンが倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Crazy Dragon struggles and collapses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見てられないとハンティ辺りが言ってもいいかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe someone like Huntie might say they can't bear to watch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その側で動けなくなっている　宝箱だんご　を捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They catch the treasure chest dumpling that has become unable to move nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝箱だんごはもう逃げない、荷物持ちにされた。→　なんか理由つけて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The treasure chest dumpling won't run away anymore; it was made a pack bearer. → Add some reason for this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつが持っているのが聖櫃か、うわっ・・重た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is that what's being carried the holy ark? Wow... it's heavy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中は・・おわっ、死体、死体、ミイラ、・・ポピンズのミイラー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside...Whoa, corpses, corpses, mummies... Poppins' mummified form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが闘神の本体であるという説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An explanation that this is the true form of the Battle God.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神シグマの部屋にも戻ったし再稼働させるかというところで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After returning to the Battle God Sigma's room, just as they were about to reactivate it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずどどーんと部屋の壁に何かが激突
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a thundering crash, something smashes into the wall of the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: げっクレイジードラゴンがまた襲ってきたなんてしぶとい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, the Crazy Dragon attacked again—what a tenacious one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今なら間に合う逃げるかとなるかランスだけは別の手を考えた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While everyone thought to escape since there's still time, only Rance considered another way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神シグマを目覚めさせて戦わせるのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wake up the Battle God Sigma and have it fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな・・目覚めるかどうか賭けだぞ・・（さっきのパットンの話ちょっと触れて）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... it's a gamble whether it will awaken... (briefly refer to the earlier Patton story).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかくやれーと、シーラが再可動させる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just do it! Sheila activates it again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どきどき・・どきどき・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heartbeat... heartbeat...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どかーんクレイジードラゴンが壁を破って現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boom! The Crazy Dragon breaks through the wall and appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう駄目かというところで、どどどどーと音がして、闘神シグマが目覚める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just when all seemed lost, with a rumbling sound, Battle God Sigma awakens.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わードラゴンがくるー、お願いシグマ助けてーと叫ぶと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, the dragon is coming—please Sigma, save us!" someone cries out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シグマとクレイジードラゴンがぶつかりあう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sigma and the Crazy Dragon clash.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと怪獣ものっぽいノリでもいいかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe having a bit of a monster-movie vibe could work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒す前、仲間の変わり果てた姿に同情的なことを言いトドメ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before finishing it off, say something sympathetic about the altered state of the companion, then deliver the final blow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クレイジードラゴンはやっと死ねたという感じで倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Crazy Dragon falls as if finally able to die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死ぬ前に正気に戻ったのがいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might be good if it regained sanity before dying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで始めて話をする　意外と気さくな奴とわかるとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the first time it talks, revealing it's surprisingly easygoing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ゼータ、闘神シグマの語らい、久しぶりじゃのとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle God Zeta and Battle God Sigma converse, saying things like "It's been a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんなども入れて和気あいあい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Including Biscetta and others, a friendly and lively atmosphere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シグマの性格は任せますが、ここで魅力的な感じに見せて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll leave Sigma's personality up to you, but please make him appear charming here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ゼータ、お前の本体のミイラなのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle God Zeta, is that mummy your true form?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この城の地下に聖櫃を置かせてもらっているぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're letting you keep the holy ark in the basement of this castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の城に気持ち悪い物をおくなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't put creepy stuff in my castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ところで、闘神シグマ、お前もここから動けないのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, Battle God Sigma, can’t you move from here either?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の闘神都市は壊れてないからな、動く為の要塞が無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My Battle God city isn't broken, but I lack a fortress to move around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、自分の聖櫃は特別製で小さい、元がポピンズという事もあるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But my holy ark is a specially made, small one—originally it was Poppins, after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試作として携帯可能な物として作ったのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was made as a prototype for something portable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこの宝箱だんご君が一緒に聖櫃を持ち運んでくれたらどこに移動出来るが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that treasure chest dumpling over there carries the holy ark together, I could move anywhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念、携帯用マナバッテリーがまだ開発出来ていない。短時間ならともかく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunately, a portable mana battery hasn't been developed yet. Short durations might be okay, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦行動をするにはとちエネルギー不足だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's too little energy for operational activities.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 根こそぎ魔力を注いでくれる魔法使いがいれば・・とシィルを見つめる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there was a magician who could pour all their mana into me... he looks at Sieel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル＝過去にユプシロンの燃料にされた事を思いだし、怖がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sieel recalls being used as fuel for Epsilon in the past and becomes afraid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じょうだんじゃ、普通の娘には無理だ、下手したら魔力吸い出しすぎて殺してしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No joke, an ordinary girl can't do it; if done badly, too much mana will be drained and she'll be killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでアニス登場、あっ・・こいつなら。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, Anis appears — Oh... if it's her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがホーネット抱きたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance wants to hold Hornet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから救出する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So he'll rescue her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 図書室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Library

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルから情報を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hear information from Howser.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 客室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guest room

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィから情報を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hear information from Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司令部で作戦会議
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Strategy meeting at headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長ラカンが現れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon commander Lakan appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自らが囮になる作戦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A plan where he becomes the decoy himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中止を選択した直後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Immediately after choosing to cancel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはやらないと言い切るランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance declares firmly that will not be done.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラカンは食い下がり、なら我々だけで行うとか言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lakan pushes back, saying then we'll go alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラと（シルキィorハウゼル)が止める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera and (Silky or Howser) stop him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少し確実な作戦を考えるのだ、時を待て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We should think of a more certain plan; wait for the right time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達は、俺の配下につけ。いいな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all will serve under me. Understand?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうしてラカン率いるホーネット派残党５万の魔物兵は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, the 50,000 demon soldiers loyal to the Hornet faction led by Lakan...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

The Crazy Dragon breaks through the wall and appears."},{"lineNumber":253689,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tもう駄目かというところで、どどどどーと音がして、闘神シグマが目覚める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Just when all seemed lost, with a rumbling sound, Battle God Sigma awakens."},{"lineNumber":253690,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tわードラゴンがくるー、お願いシグマ助けてーと叫ぶと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, the dragon is coming—please Sigma, save us!\" someone cries out."},{"lineNumber":253691,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシグマとクレイジードラゴンがぶつかりあう","translatedEnglishLine":"Sigma and the Crazy Dragon clash."},{"lineNumber":253692,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tちょっと怪獣ものっぽいノリでもいいかも","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe having a bit of a monster-movie vibe could work."},{"lineNumber":253693,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t倒す前、仲間の変わり果てた姿に同情的なことを言いトドメ","translatedEnglishLine":"Before finishing it off, say something sympathetic about the altered state of the companion, then deliver the final blow."},{"lineNumber":253694,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tクレイジードラゴンはやっと死ねたという感じで倒れる","translatedEnglishLine":"The Crazy Dragon falls as if finally able to die."},{"lineNumber":253695,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t死ぬ前に正気に戻ったのがいいかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"It might be good if it regained sanity before dying."},{"lineNumber":253696,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tここで始めて話をする　意外と気さくな奴とわかるとか","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the first time it talks, revealing it's surprisingly easygoing."},{"lineNumber":253697,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle"},{"lineNumber":253698,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t闘神ゼータ、闘神シグマの語らい、久しぶりじゃのとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle God Zeta and Battle God Sigma converse, saying things like \"It's been a while.\""},{"lineNumber":253699,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tビスケッタさんなども入れて和気あいあい","translatedEnglishLine":"Including Biscetta and others, a friendly and lively atmosphere."},{"lineNumber":253700,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシグマの性格は任せますが、ここで魅力的な感じに見せて下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll leave Sigma's personality up to you, but please make him appear charming here."},{"lineNumber":253701,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t闘神ゼータ、お前の本体のミイラなのか。","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle God Zeta, is that mummy your true form?"},{"lineNumber":253702,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの城の地下に聖櫃を置かせてもらっているぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"We're letting you keep the holy ark in the basement of this castle."},{"lineNumber":253703,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t俺の城に気持ち悪い物をおくなよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't put creepy stuff in my castle."},{"lineNumber":253704,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tところで、闘神シグマ、お前もここから動けないのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, Battle God Sigma, can’t you move from here either?"},{"lineNumber":253705,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t自分の闘神都市は壊れてないからな、動く為の要塞が無い","translatedEnglishLine":"My Battle God city isn't broken, but I lack a fortress to move around."},{"lineNumber":253706,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tだが、自分の聖櫃は特別製で小さい、元がポピンズという事もあるが","translatedEnglishLine":"But my holy ark is a specially made, small one—originally it was Poppins, after all."},{"lineNumber":253707,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t試作として携帯可能な物として作ったのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"It was made as a prototype for something portable."},{"lineNumber":253708,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそこの宝箱だんご君が一緒に聖櫃を持ち運んでくれたらどこに移動出来るが","translatedEnglishLine":"If that treasure chest dumpling over there carries the holy ark together, I could move anywhere."},{"lineNumber":253709,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t残念、携帯用マナバッテリーがまだ開発出来ていない。短時間ならともかく","translatedEnglishLine":"Unfortunately, a portable mana battery hasn't been developed yet. Short durations might be okay, but..."},{"lineNumber":253710,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t作戦行動をするにはとちエネルギー不足だな","translatedEnglishLine":"There's too little energy for operational activities."},{"lineNumber":253711,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t根こそぎ魔力を注いでくれる魔法使いがいれば・・とシィルを見つめる","translatedEnglishLine":"If there was a magician who could pour all their mana into me... he looks at Sieel."},{"lineNumber":253712,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシィル＝過去にユプシロンの燃料にされた事を思いだし、怖がる","translatedEnglishLine":"Sieel recalls being used as fuel for Epsilon in the past and becomes afraid."},{"lineNumber":253713,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tじょうだんじゃ、普通の娘には無理だ、下手したら魔力吸い出しすぎて殺してしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"No joke, an ordinary girl can't do it; if done badly, too much mana will be drained and she'll be killed."},{"lineNumber":253714,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tここでアニス登場、あっ・・こいつなら。","translatedEnglishLine":"At this point, Anis appears — Oh... if it's her."},{"lineNumber":253715,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle"},{"lineNumber":253716,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスがホーネット抱きたい","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance wants to hold Hornet."},{"lineNumber":253717,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tだから救出する","translatedEnglishLine":"So he'll rescue her."},{"lineNumber":253718,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t図書室","translatedEnglishLine":"Library"},{"lineNumber":253719,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\tハウゼルから情報を聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Hear information from Howser."},{"lineNumber":253720,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t客室","translatedEnglishLine":"Guest room"},{"lineNumber":253721,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\tシルキィから情報を聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Hear information from Silky."},{"lineNumber":253722,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t司令部で作戦会議","translatedEnglishLine":"Strategy meeting at headquarters."},{"lineNumber":253723,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔物隊長ラカンが現れ","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon commander Lakan appears."},{"lineNumber":253724,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t自らが囮になる作戦","translatedEnglishLine":"A plan where he becomes the decoy himself."},{"lineNumber":253725,"originalJapaneseLine":"中止を選択した直後","translatedEnglishLine":"Immediately after choosing to cancel."},{"lineNumber":253726,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはやらないと言い切るランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance declares firmly that will not be done."},{"lineNumber":253727,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラカンは食い下がり、なら我々だけで行うとか言うが","translatedEnglishLine":"Lakan pushes back, saying then we'll go alone."},{"lineNumber":253728,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラと（シルキィorハウゼル)が止める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera and (Silky or Howser) stop him."},{"lineNumber":253729,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう少し確実な作戦を考えるのだ、時を待て","translatedEnglishLine":"We should think of a more certain plan; wait for the right time."},{"lineNumber":253730,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前達は、俺の配下につけ。いいな","translatedEnglishLine":"You all will serve under me. Understand?"},{"lineNumber":253731,"originalJapaneseLine":"こうしてラカン率いるホーネット派残党５万の魔物兵は","translatedEnglishLine":"Thus, the 50,000 demon soldiers loyal to the Hornet faction led by Lakan..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いたくはないが、戦わざるえない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't want to fight, but I have no choice but to.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もがき苦しんでクレイジードラゴンが倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Crazy Dragon struggles and collapses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見てられないとハンティ辺りが言ってもいいかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe someone like Huntie might say they can't bear to watch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その側で動けなくなっている　宝箱だんご　を捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They catch the treasure chest dumpling that has become unable to move nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝箱だんごはもう逃げない、荷物持ちにされた。→　なんか理由つけて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The treasure chest dumpling won't run away anymore; it was made a pack bearer. → Add some reason for this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつが持っているのが聖櫃か、うわっ・・重た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is that what's being carried the holy ark? Wow... it's heavy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中は・・おわっ、死体、死体、ミイラ、・・ポピンズのミイラー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside...Whoa, corpses, corpses, mummies... Poppins' mummified form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが闘神の本体であるという説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An explanation that this is the true form of the Battle God.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神シグマの部屋にも戻ったし再稼働させるかというところで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After returning to the Battle God Sigma's room, just as they were about to reactivate it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずどどーんと部屋の壁に何かが激突
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a thundering crash, something smashes into the wall of the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: げっクレイジードラゴンがまた襲ってきたなんてしぶとい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, the Crazy Dragon attacked again—what a tenacious one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今なら間に合う逃げるかとなるかランスだけは別の手を考えた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While everyone thought to escape since there's still time, only Rance considered another way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神シグマを目覚めさせて戦わせるのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wake up the Battle God Sigma and have it fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな・・目覚めるかどうか賭けだぞ・・（さっきのパットンの話ちょっと触れて）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... it's a gamble whether it will awaken... (briefly refer to the earlier Patton story).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかくやれーと、シーラが再可動させる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just do it! Sheila activates it again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どきどき・・どきどき・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heartbeat... heartbeat...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どかーんクレイジードラゴンが壁を破って現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boom! The Crazy Dragon breaks through the wall and appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう駄目かというところで、どどどどーと音がして、闘神シグマが目覚める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just when all seemed lost, with a rumbling sound, Battle God Sigma awakens.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わードラゴンがくるー、お願いシグマ助けてーと叫ぶと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, the dragon is coming—please Sigma, save us!" someone cries out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シグマとクレイジードラゴンがぶつかりあう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sigma and the Crazy Dragon clash.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと怪獣ものっぽいノリでもいいかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe having a bit of a monster-movie vibe could work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒す前、仲間の変わり果てた姿に同情的なことを言いトドメ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before finishing it off, say something sympathetic about the altered state of the companion, then deliver the final blow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クレイジードラゴンはやっと死ねたという感じで倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Crazy Dragon falls as if finally able to die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死ぬ前に正気に戻ったのがいいかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might be good if it regained sanity before dying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで始めて話をする　意外と気さくな奴とわかるとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the first time it talks, revealing it's surprisingly easygoing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ゼータ、闘神シグマの語らい、久しぶりじゃのとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle God Zeta and Battle God Sigma converse, saying things like "It's been a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんなども入れて和気あいあい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Including Biscetta and others, a friendly and lively atmosphere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シグマの性格は任せますが、ここで魅力的な感じに見せて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll leave Sigma's personality up to you, but please make him appear charming here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神ゼータ、お前の本体のミイラなのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle God Zeta, is that mummy your true form?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この城の地下に聖櫃を置かせてもらっているぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're letting you keep the holy ark in the basement of this castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の城に気持ち悪い物をおくなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't put creepy stuff in my castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ところで、闘神シグマ、お前もここから動けないのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, Battle God Sigma, can’t you move from here either?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の闘神都市は壊れてないからな、動く為の要塞が無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My Battle God city isn't broken, but I lack a fortress to move around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、自分の聖櫃は特別製で小さい、元がポピンズという事もあるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But my holy ark is a specially made, small one—originally it was Poppins, after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試作として携帯可能な物として作ったのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was made as a prototype for something portable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこの宝箱だんご君が一緒に聖櫃を持ち運んでくれたらどこに移動出来るが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that treasure chest dumpling over there carries the holy ark together, I could move anywhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念、携帯用マナバッテリーがまだ開発出来ていない。短時間ならともかく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunately, a portable mana battery hasn't been developed yet. Short durations might be okay, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦行動をするにはとちエネルギー不足だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's too little energy for operational activities.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 根こそぎ魔力を注いでくれる魔法使いがいれば・・とシィルを見つめる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there was a magician who could pour all their mana into me... he looks at Sieel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル＝過去にユプシロンの燃料にされた事を思いだし、怖がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sieel recalls being used as fuel for Epsilon in the past and becomes afraid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じょうだんじゃ、普通の娘には無理だ、下手したら魔力吸い出しすぎて殺してしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No joke, an ordinary girl can't do it; if done badly, too much mana will be drained and she'll be killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでアニス登場、あっ・・こいつなら。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, Anis appears — Oh... if it's her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがホーネット抱きたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance wants to hold Hornet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから救出する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So he'll rescue her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 図書室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Library

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルから情報を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hear information from Howser.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 客室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guest room

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィから情報を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hear information from Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司令部で作戦会議
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Strategy meeting at headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長ラカンが現れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon commander Lakan appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自らが囮になる作戦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A plan where he becomes the decoy himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中止を選択した直後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Immediately after choosing to cancel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはやらないと言い切るランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance declares firmly that will not be done.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラカンは食い下がり、なら我々だけで行うとか言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lakan pushes back, saying then we'll go alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラと（シルキィorハウゼル)が止める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera and (Silky or Howser) stop him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少し確実な作戦を考えるのだ、時を待て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We should think of a more certain plan; wait for the right time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達は、俺の配下につけ。いいな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all will serve under me. Understand?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうしてラカン率いるホーネット派残党５万の魔物兵は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, the 50,000 demon soldiers loyal to the Hornet faction led by Lakan...
